short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limit daily chess games on Chess.com and Lichess

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Limit the number of games you play on Chess.com and Lichess!

Configure your username and your daily limit (based on weekday), and the extension will prevent you from exceeding your limit on both websites.

This extension is open source:
https://github.com/eronnen/ChessBlocker

You're welcome to send bugs, feature requests and contributions here:
https://github.com/eronnen/ChessBlocker/issues
